TourismSection.title: Destinations & Services
TourismSection.subtitle: Discover the best experiences in our village

1.title: Belik Bolu Cliff
1.about: A karst cliff area topographically suitable for climbing. Often used by local nature lovers for rock climbing practice.

2.title: Telaga Jarum Waterfall
2.about: Hidden in the lush plantation. Its soothing sound is perfect for meditation or self-healing.

3.title: Umbulan Karang Camping Ground
3.about: A water source area surrounded by large trees. Very popular for pre-wedding photos, scout camping, or community events.

4.title: Village Cycling Tour
4.about: Cycle around Krajan, Kebon, and Belik hamlets while enjoying the green hills and beautiful rice fields.

5.title: Belik Hamlet Hill Landscape
5.about: The highest point to see the view of the entire village and the sunset over the rice fields.

21.title: Jajar Gumregah Park
21.about: The village center, a spacious open-air art performance venue with beautiful cliff views.

6.title: Traditional Blacksmith
6.about: Watch the process of forging iron into farming tools or sharp weapons using traditional methods (using bellows).

7.title: Simpai Woven Crafts
7.about: Tourists can learn to make various traditional woven crafts such as baskets, mats, and hats from simpai.

8.title: Making Debog Tempeh
8.about: Learn the unique tempeh fermentation technique that uses banana stems (debog) instead of plastic or banana leaves.

9.title: Statue Carving
9.about: Tourists can see and learn about traditional sculpture using simple tools.

11.title: Tiban Tradition
11.about: A whip fight ritual between men to summon rain. Tourists can learn about the philosophy behind this Tiban tradition.

12.title: Jedoran Salalahuk
12.about: Traditional percussion music using large tambourines/rebana which is very rhythmic and magical.

13.title: Karawitan & Dance
13.about: Direct training in playing gamelan and dancing local dances for tourists staying overnight.

14.title: Bersih Desa Ceremony
14.about: A major annual event involving all residents with a parade of agricultural produce tumpeng.

16.title: Cukdeh (Pincuk Lodeh)
16.about: Spicy savory vegetable stew served in leaf containers, usually enjoyed on the edge of the rice fields.

17.title: Cassava Cimplung
17.about: Sweet snack made from cassava boiled for a long time in hot coconut sap during the brown sugar making process.

18.title: Wedang Suwuk
18.about: Ancient drink made from pure coffee brewed with water and palm sugar. Called 'suwuk' because the brewing process is like a healing ritual.

19.title: Sego Gegok
19.about: Rice wrapped in banana leaves with spicy anchovy chili sauce, steamed to give a very strong aroma typical of Jajar Village.

20.title: Paseban Cafe
20.about: This cafe offers modern and traditional menus with calming views of rice fields and hills. Perfect for afternoon healing.

15.title: Traditional Homestay
15.about: Stay in residents' homes with complete facilities while experiencing the daily life of the village community.

0.subtitle: Welcome to Jajar Village
0.title: Jajar Gumregah
0.desc: Discover the charm of rural life and authentic cultural experiences in our picturesque village.

1.subtitle: Explore Beauty of Nature
1.title: Jajar Gumregah
1.desc: From lush rice fields to serene waterfalls, immerse yourself in the breathtaking landscapes of Jajar.

2.subtitle: Cultural Heritage Awaits
2.title: Jajar Gumregah
2.desc: Experience traditional arts, crafts, and ceremonies that showcase the rich heritage of our community.

AboutSection.title: Getting to Know Jajar Village Closer
AboutSection.paragraf1: Located in Gandusari Subdistrict, Trenggalek Regency. Surrounded by green hills and beautiful rice fields, this village is an ideal place for tourists who want to experience tranquillity.
AboutSection.paragraf2: Under the shade of Trenggalek's green hills, the Tiban tradition brings the legend of the rainmaker to life through a soul-stirring whip-cracking attraction. Explore Jajar Tourism Village, a place where the purity of nature and the majesty of ancestral culture come together in an unforgettable escape.

NewsSection.title: Latest Jajar News
NewsSection.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest happenings in Jajar Village
